snippet: Valentine’s Day can be more than cavities and bearhugs, and we have last-minute ideas for celebrating your sweetheart (or yourself) this year and exploring the many facets of love.

byline.original: Compiled by THE NEW YORK TIMES

lead_paragraph: Valentine’s Day can be more than cavities and bearhugs, and we have last-minute ideas for celebrating your sweetheart (or yourself) this year and exploring the many facets of love.
